original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas has increased prices of domestic gas cylinders.
Litro Gas has taken measures to increase the price of a 12.5 kg domestic gas cylinder by Rs.685.
Accordingly, the new price of a 12.5 kg domestic gas cylinder is Rs.4,250.
The price of a 5 kg gas cylinder was increased by Rs.276, to Rs.1,770.
The price of a 2.3 kg gas cylinder was increased by Rs.128, and the new price is Rs.795.
